name: iMac Memoji Profile Picture
description:
About

A simple but colorful way to update your profile picture showing up your new iMac (2021) with your Memoji. To get your Memoji from your iPhone you can:


A) Go to Notes, insert a Memoji sticker, hold press the Memoji sticker, then tap on Share and then onto Save Image.


B) Go to iMessage, then tap on Animoji or Memoji, and then tap on the â€¢â€¢â€¢ icon and screenshot your best pose.


C) Same way as option B, but after tapping â€¢â€¢â€¢ tap on Edit (this is a slightly bigger size).


Suggestions? Let me know! @emirsaldierna on Twitter.
